traits.Amphibious: The giant crayfish can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12+1d4 + 10). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
